database.nodatabasesavailable: There are no databases that can be used. To create a database click on the Add Database link.
database.databaseinvalidpermissionstext: The following databases have invalid permissions set:
database.adddatabaseautogenerate: Leave the filename blank to automatically generate a filename.
database.adddatabasenoextensions: Don't include any extensions as it will be done automatically.
database.adddatabasecharacterlength: The filename cannot be any more than 32 characters long.
database.adddatabasecharacters: The filename should only contain letters, numbers and no spaces.
database.deletedatabasemessage: Are you sure you want to delete '%s'?
database.deletedatabasereturn: No, return to the database list.

pages.returnpagelist: Return to the page list for the '%s' database.
pages.viewpagelist: View the page list for the '%s' database.
pages.databasepageerror: A database error occurred while getting the page information with the filename '%s': %s
pages.databasepagedoesnotexist: The page with the filename '%s' does not exist.
pages.databasecopyfrompageerror: The page with the filename '%s' does not exist in the database that the page is to be copied from.
pages.databasecopyfromdatabaseerror: A database error has occurred while copying the page with the filename '%s' from the old database: %s
pages.databasecopytodatabaseerror: A database error has occurred while copying the page with the filename '%s' to the new database: %s
pages.databasecopyfrompagenotexist: The page with the filename '%s' does not exist in the database that the page is to be copied from.
pages.databasecopytopageexists: The page with the filename '%s' already exists in the database that the page is to be copied to.
pages.databasemovefrompageerror: A database error has occurred while moving the page with the filename '%s' from the old database: %s
pages.databasemovetopageerror: A database error has occurred while moving the page with the filename '%s' to the new database: %s
pages.databasemovefrompagenotexist: The page with the filename '%s' does not exist in the database that the page is to be moved from.
pages.databasemovetopageexists: The page with the filename '%s' already exists in the database that the page is to be moved to.
pages.pagedoesnotexist: The page with the filename '%s' does not exist in the database that the page is to be moved from.
pages.usepageandsection: Use page name and section name.
pages.nopagesection: Don't use page name or section name.
pages.notemplatedatabase: Template database does not exist. No template will be used.
pages.notemplatedatabasekeep: Template database does not exist. Existing template settings can be kept.
pages.templatepermissionserror: Template database has invalid permissions set. No template will be used.
pages.templatepermissionserrorkeep: Template database has invalid permissions set. Existing template settings can be kept.
pages.templatedatabaseerror: A database error occurred while trying to get the list of templates: %s
pages.templatedatabaseerrorkeep: A database error occurred while trying to get the list of templates: '%s'. Existing template settings can be kept.
pages.notemplatesavailable: There are no templates in the template database. No template will be used.
pages.templatedatabasenotexistmultieditkeep: The template database does not exist. Existing template settings for selected pages kept.
pages.templatedatabasepermissionsinvalidmultie: The template database has invalid permissions set. Existing template settings for selected pages kept.
pages.templatedatabaseerrormultieditkeep: A database error occurred while trying to get the list of templates: %s. Existing template settings for selected pages kept.
pages.nodatabaseselected: No database selected. Please select a database from the drop-down list below and then press the 'View' button to view the pages in the selected database.
pages.nopagesindatabase: No pages exist in this database. To create a page for this database, click on Add Page link at the top of the page.
pages.pageaddedmessage: The page called '%s' was added to the '%s' database successfully.
pages.deletepagemessage: Are you sure you want to delete '%s' from the '%s' database?
pages.pagedeletedmessage: The page named '%s' was deleted from the '%s' database.
pages.deletemultiplemessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected pages below from the '%s' database?
pages.deletepagesreturnlink: No, return to the page list for the '%s' database.
pages.selectedpagesdeletedmessage: The following pages were deleted from the '%s' database:
pages.movepagesmessage: Which database do you want to move the following pages from the '%s' database to?
pages.movedpagesmessage: The following pages from the '%s' database were moved to the '%s' database:
pages.nopagesmoved: No pages were moved from the '%s' database to the '%s' database.
pages.errormessages: The following errors/warnings have occurred while moving the pages:
pages.copypagesmessage: Which database do you want to copy the following pages from the '%s' database to?
pages.copypagesresultmessage: The following pages from the '%s' database were copied to the '%s' database:
pages.nopagescopied: No pages were copied from the '%s' database to the '%s' database.
pages.copypageswarnings: The following errors/warnings have occurred while copying the pages:
pages.multieditmessage: The following pages from the '%s' database will be altered:
pages.multieditmessagevalues: Using the values below (click on the checkbox for each value to be edited on the selected pages):
pages.nopagesedited: No pages were edited in the '%s' database.
pages.pagesedited: The selected pages in the '%s' database have been edited:
pages.editedpageswarnings: The following errors/warnings occurred while editing the selected pages:

filter.noprioritygiven: If no filter priority is specified, the filter priority will be set to 1.
filter.nofiltersavailable: There are no filters available in the filter database. To add a filter, click on the Add Filter link.
filter.filterdatabasedoesnotexist: The filter database does not exist and will be created when a filter is added.
filter.blankfindfilters: One (or more) of your filters has a blank find filter and needs to be fixed.
filter.filteraddedmessage: The filter was added successfully to the filters list.
filter.deletefiltermessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected filter?
filter.deletefilterreturn: No, return to the filter list.
filter.deletedfiltermessage: The selected filter was deleted from the filters list.

template.templatedatabasedoesnotexist: The template database doesn't exist and will be created when a template is added.
template.notemplatesavailable: There are no templates in the template database. To add a template click on the Add Template link.
template.addedtemplatemessage: The template called '%s' was successfully created.
template.editedtemplatemessage: The selected template called '%s' was edited.
template.deletetemplatemessage: Are you sure you want to delete the template called '%s' (%s)?
template.deletetemplatereturntolist: No, return to the template list.
template.deletedtemplatemessage: The selected template called '%s' was deleted.

compile.returncompilelist: Return to the compile database list.
compile.nodatabasesavailable: There are no databases that can be used for compiling.
compile.compilealldatabasesmessage: Do you want to compile all of the databases in the database directory?
compile.compileselecteddatabasesmessage: Do you want to compile the following databases?
compile.compiledatabasemessage: Are you sure you want to compile the '%s' database?
compile.filterdatabasemissing: The filter database does not exist. No filters will be used.
compile.filterdatabasepermissions: The filter database has invalid permissions set. No filters will be used.
compile.filterdatabaseerror: A filter database error has occurred: %s. No filters will be used.
compile.findfilterblank: One (or more) of the find filters from the filter database is blank.
compile.templatedatabasemissing: The template database does not exist. Pages will be compiled without templates being used.
compile.templatedatabasepermissions: The template database has invalid permissions set. Pages will be compiled without templates being used.
compile.templatedatabaseerror: A database error occurred while trying to get the list of templates: %s
compile.databasefilenameinvalidcharacters: The database with the filename '%s' has invalid characters. Skipping this database...
compile.databasefilenametoolong: The database with the filename '%s' is too long. Skipping this database...
compile.databasemissing: The database with the filename '%s' does not exist. Skipping this database...
compile.databaseinvalidpermissions: The database with the filename '%s' has invalid permissions set. Skipping this database...
compile.databaseerror: A database error has occurred on the database with the filename '%s': %s
compile.databasepageerror: A database error has occurred on the database with the filename '%s' while getting the list of pages: %s
compile.invalidpagefilename: The page '%s' has an invalid filename. Page skipped.
compile.templatefilemissing: The template with the filename '%s' for '%s' (%s) does not exist.
compile.pageinvalidpermissions: The page with the filename '%s' has invalid permissions set. Page not written.
compile.pagenotwritten: An error occured while writing the page with the filename '%s': %s
compile.databasefinish: Finished compiling pages in the '%s' database...
compile.cleanoutputdirectorymessage: Are you sure you want to clean the output directory?
compile.somecontentnotremoved: Some of the contents of the directory were removed. However, not all of the files in the output directory were deleted due to invalid permissions.
compile.contentremoved: The contents of the output directory have been removed.

setting.currentsettings: The current settings being used are the following:
setting.altersettings: To alter the current settings, select the Edit Settings option at the top of the page.
setting.warningmessage: Settings that have changed take effect after clicking on the 'Change Settings' button and viewing the confirmation message.
setting.singleday: D - Show single digit day if day value is less than 10.
setting.doubleday: DD - Show double digit day if day value is less than 10.
setting.singlemonth: M - Show single digit month if month value is less than 10.
setting.doublemonth: MM - Show double digit month if month value is less than 10.
setting.singleyear: Y - Show double digit year value.
setting.doubleyear: YY - Show four digit year value.
setting.singlehour: h - Show single digit hour if hour value is less than 10.
setting.doublehour: hh - Show double digit hour if hour value is less than 10.
setting.singleminute: m - Show single digit minute if minute value is less than 10.
setting.doubleminute: mm - Show double digit minute if minute value is less than 10.
setting.singlesecond: s - Show single digit second if second value is less than 10.
setting.doublesecond: ss - Show double digit second if second value is less than 10.
setting.returnsettingslist: Return to the list of settings.
setting.settingseditedmessage: The page settings have been changed and will take effect on the next page load of Kiriwrite.

error.extendederror: The extended information about the error is:
error.generic: An error has occurred but not an error that is known to Kiriwrite.
error.internalerror: An internal error has occurred within Kiriwrite.
error.invalidfilename: The filename given contains invalid characters.
error.invalidvariable: An variable with invalid data has been found.
error.variabletoolong: A variable given is too long.
error.blankcompiletype: The compile type specified was blank.
error.blankdatabasepageadd: No database was specified when trying to add a page.
error.blankdirectory: The directory name specified was blank.
error.blankdatetimeformat: The date and time format given is blank.
error.databaseconnectionerror: A database connection error has occurred.
error.databasecategoriestoolong: The database categories list is too long.
error.databasecopysame: The database that the pages are being copied to is the same database that the pages are copied from.

error.databasenorename: The database cannot be renamed due to invalid permissions set.

common.pagetitle: <kiriwrite:pagetitle> - Specifies the page title (and page section depending on page settings).
common.pageautotitle: <kiriwrite:autotitle> - Automatic page title (and page section depending on page settings).
